strandedonaraft.about: Stranded on a Raft is a survival game where the player finds themselves alone on a small raft in the middle of the ocean. The goal is to collect resources, make tools and shelter, and try to survive as long as possible while avoiding dangers like sharks and hunger.
strandedonaraft.controls: WASD - Player movement, Right Click - Place blocks,Left Click - Interact tools (like fishing rods and spears) and to eat food, E - Opens inventory menu, C - Opens crafting menu, ESC - Opens save menu

subwaysurfers.about: Subway Surfers is a classic endless runner game where Jake navigates subways to escape Inspector and his dog. Players collect coins to unlock power-ups, special gear, and customize characters and boards. Earn keys for unlocking characters and hoverboards, and complete daily Word Hunts and missions to earn rewards. Created by Kiloo and Sybo in 2012, Subway Surfers remains a popular online game.
subwaysurfers.controls: Use the left/right arrow to move left/right. Use the up arrow to jump. Use the down arrow to roll. Use space to activate hoverboard

sugarsugar.about: Sugar, Sugar is a simulation game created by Bart Bonte. Solve puzzles by sifting the sugar into coffee cups! Your job is to draw bridges and well-placed lines to capture each grain. Every level will have a new, sweet challenge, and the obstacles get harder as the game progresses. Concentrate to reach every granular objective!
sugarsugar.controls: Use your left mouse button or finger to draw a line, and fill up the cups.

sugarsugar2.about: Sugar, Sugar 2 is a simulation game created by Bart Bonte. Solve puzzles by sifting the sugar into coffee cups! Your job is to draw bridges and well-placed lines to capture each grain. Every level will have a new, sweet challenge, and the obstacles get harder as the game progresses. Concentrate to reach every granular objective!

sugarsugar3.about: Sugar, Sugar 3 is a simulation game created by Bart Bonte. Solve puzzles by sifting the sugar into coffee cups! Your job is to draw bridges and well-placed lines to capture each grain. Every level will have a new, sweet challenge, and the obstacles get harder as the game progresses. Concentrate to reach every granular objective!

sugarsugar4.about: Sugar, Sugar: The Christmas Special is a winter-themed puzzle game by Bart Bonte, where players fill cups with sugar by drawing lines to guide physics-based flackes. The falling sweets must be able to slide down, adjusting gravity to ensure they don't squandered on the floor and find their way into a drink like mulled wine. Enjoy this festive and sugary puzzle game for a festive holiday experience.

superautopets.about: Battle against other players at your own pace in this free to play chill auto battler. In Super Auto Pets you build a team from a lovable cast of animals who will fight for you. They each have unique abilites, so choose wisely who will join your team!
superautopets.controls: Click  with the left mouse button on the icons on the screen

superhot.about: SUPERHOT Prototype is a first-person shooter game where time moves. Players shoot and move to see bullets fly off, while standing still stops them from moving. They must dodge enemy fire and use their limited bullets to progress. The game features five levels, and the final boss is the ultimate challenge.
superhot.controls: Move using WASD, shoot with a left mouse click

superhotlinemiamideluxe.about: You play as QA-Bot1986, a weapon quality assurance robot working for a big and shady corporation called SHOOTOUT INC. An unexpected glitch occured during your manufacturing, giving your cyber brain the ability to process data at 5861% higher speed than ordinary bots, allowing you to alter your perception of time and make it advance only when you move.
superhotlinemiamideluxe.controls: WASD to move, mouse to aim, left click to shoot, right click to pick up gun

supermario.about: Play this exciting version of Super Mario but now in Flash!
supermario.controls: Press option buttons once in the game

supermario63.about: Created by passionate and talented fans, this game is naturally inspired by Super Mario 64 and is certainly one of the best retro remake of Mario in flash currently available. Riding a seagull or using a water-propelled jetpack, go in search of Princess Peach and rescue her from the clutches of the nefarious Bowser. The game is full of discoveries of all kinds and a tutorial will luckily take you by the hand to show you all its facets.
supermario63.controls: Up: Jump, Left and Right: Walk, Down: Duck/Dive, Z : Talk/Ground Pound, X: Spin Attack, C or Space: Use Fludd, Shift: Switch Fludds, P: Pause Game. - Zoom Out, +Zoom In

supermario64.about: Players take on the role of a security guard who must survive the night shift at a fictional pizza restaurant without being attacked by the animatronic characters that wander through the building.

superraftboat.about: The world's been flooded, and all you have is your Super Raft Boat. You keep sailing, hoping to find an island while fighting off the creatures of the sea. From the Clear Skies to the Sea of the Damned, can you reach The Final Island?
superraftboat.controls: WASD, Left click to shoot, Right click to build your raft more.

swerve.about: Swerve! That is the only way for you to achieve your ultimate goal in this game. Drive for as long as you can, making sharp turns, often in a row. Increase your speed as you drive farther and farther in hopes of making it to the end of the line. Gifts litter your path and increase your score as you go! Are you up for the ultimate challenge of reaching it to the very end? Can you collect all the gifts as well or will you just swerve off the road and end in failure?
swerve.controls: Click or tap at the right time to let the car change direction. How long can you survive?

swordzio.about: Swordz.io is the intense online battle game in which you take to the battlefield in an attempt to become the champion. You will start the battle with only a tree branch, you must use your skills to beat players with you limited weapon to gather food. This can be used to upgrade your character so that you can become a force to be reckoned with during the fight.
swordzio.controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, Left click to attack, Right click to dash

tamingio.about: Taming-io is a survival .io game with magical pets that fight by your side. Harvest resources and unlock upgrades as you age. Craft items, build a base, and battle other players and their pets to become the savviest survivor.
tamingio.controls: WASD or ZQSD or arrow keys to move, Left mouse button to attack

tanukisunset.about: Tanuki Sunset is a downhill skateboarding game with a raccoon protagonist called Tanuki. Master the corners and do skateboard tricks to earn points. Enjoy an excellent soundtrack and colorful visuals as you control the coolest raccoon down winding roads into the sunset.
tanukisunset.controls: A/D or left/right arrow to move, W or up arrow to enter speed stance, S or down arrow to do 180-degree slide, Space bar to drift, Esc to pause

templeofboom.about: Enter the battle arena of the Temple of Boom and kill all your enemies in this new game. You can play by yourself (campaign or endless), or you can find a friend and battle him or her! Collect new weapons, health, and ammo by opening the chests that are located throughout each level. Have fun!

templerun2.about: Temple Run 2, developed by Imangi, is an infinite runner where the player must escape from his enemy and avoid all the obstacles and traps that are found along the way. Traverse cliffs, forests and even mines, and help this fearless treasure hunter escape with the gold idol. But hurry up! The evil monkey monsters are chasing you! Do you dare to join this exciting adrenaline-charged adventure?
templerun2.controls: Move - AD or Left/Right arrow keys, Jump - W or Up arrow key, Slide down- S or Down arrow key

territorial.about: Territorial.io is a strategy io game where players fight to expand their nations. Defend your territory, expand, and conquer the map in games of up to 500 players.
territorial.controls: Use the left mouse button to play.

tetralegends.about: Tetra Legends is a browser-based, single player fan game in development.
tetralegends.controls: Check the controls page in the game

tetrisworlds.about: Tetris Worlds is the first official game to feature the then-newly-standardized Tetris Guideline; this includes SRS, Hold piece, locking hard drop, infinity move reset, and standard tetromino colors. Unlike later games, Tetris Worlds had an autorepeat feature for the rotation button; holding down the rotation key kept the piece spinning continually.
tetrisworlds.controls: You can view the controls (keyboard) in each game in the screen before the game starts. Use the arrow keys and Z, X, C buttons to play. Depending on the console, controls may vary.

thefinalearth2.about: The Final Earth 2 is a vertical city building game. Starting on a small rock in outer-space, you have to build your city and population from the ground up – literally. Resource management and a happy workforce is the key to building a thriving metropolis.
thefinalearth2.controls: Use the mouse to play. Tip: Ctrl+Click near a citizen to follow them!

theheist.about: The Heist is a free racing game where players play as a professional getaway driver for mobs and bank robbers, earning cash for upgrades. The getting away part is crucial, and players must dodge cops, traffic, and obstacles to arrive alive and pay. Mastering the time-saving feature is a useful tool, but it takes time to master.
theheist.controls: Arrow keys to drive; spacebar for weapon; shift to slow time

thelastio.about: TheLast.io is an epic fantasy 2D battle royale game. In this title, you must fight using a variety of magic and melee skills. You must work hard and do what you can to outlast your opponents and be the last character standing!, At the start of the game, you have to launch yourself out of a dragon’s nest, like the Battle Bus in Fortnite! Look out for different loot chests and pick up whatever new weapons and equipment you can!
thelastio.controls: Movement: WASD or arrow keys, Aiming/looking: Mouse cursor, Attacking: Left mouse button, Interacting: E, Switching weapon/item: 1-6, mouse wheel, or clicking on the inventory slot, Jumping off the dragon and descending more quickly: Space bar, Use accessory: Space bar

thelegendofzeldaocarinaoftime.about: Link, raised in an elf-like village, discovers the Great Deku Tree's curse and is sent to Hyrule Castle to investigate. Princess Zelda informs him that Ganondorf, the leader of the Gerudo tribe, seeks the Triforce, a holy relic that grants immense power. Link must save Hyrule by obtaining the Triforce before Ganondorf does.
thelegendofzeldaocarinaoftime.display_name: The Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time

thereisnogame.about: This game, wait is it a game? There is No Game! Or is there? Complete various challenges as the narrator attempts to convince you there is no game.

thevisitor.about: The Visitor is a point-and-click game in which you become an alien parasite that needs to consume the living beings to grow and dominate the world. Solve the challenge in each scene and spread the terror!
thevisitor.controls: Left mouse button to interact with an object.

trimps.about: Trimps is a resource management, incremental game developed by GreenSatellite, where players control a society of impish creatures called Trimps. With them, the player must venture through zones and maps, defeating a plethora of bad guys in order to obtain loot and unlock upgrades to further their advancement as a society. A journey of conquest and discovery awaits you!

tron.about: FL Tron is an awesome arcade game that combines aspects of the iconic snake game together with the iconic Tron movies and games. During each level you must control your very own Tron style snake and try to outwite your opponent and box them in - you must try and surround them and force them to crash!
tron.controls: Jade Controls: WASD to move, Tab to use turbo. Violet Controls: Arrow keys to move, Enter to use turbo

tunnelrush.about: Zoom at high speed through the colorful tunnel avoiding obstacles. The game takes you through various levels with challenging new obstacles the further you progress!
tunnelrush.controls: Use left and right arrow to move.

unfairmario.about: Unfair Mario is a platform game inspired by Mario and Trap Adventure 2. Can you complete the level without triggering the hidden traps?
unfairmario.controls: Use the Left and right arrows to move. Use the Up arrow to jump

unnecessaryevil.about: Glark, Steve, Bonny-chan, Noruto, and Hodur, a team fighting Lord Druksor, wake up in a strange place. They must escape quickly to resume their fight. Glark, the leader, may need drastic actions to return to the light of day. In this puzzle-platformer, players alternate control between five characters and choose which character to sacrifice to overcome obstacles.
unnecessaryevil.controls: Move - A and D  or  Q and D, Jump - W  or  Z, Step down - S, Change character - SPACE, Restart level - R, Reset game - T
unnecessaryevil.developer: Eva Abollivier, Agriraldan, Xenation, Suliac on Itch.io

vengeio.about: Venge.io is a multiplayer FPS game with capture-the-flag mechanics. Select your character, pick a weapon, and jump into the fast-paced action. Use your sharp skills and reflexes to dominate the leaderboard. Unlock cards and use them tactically against your opponents.
vengeio.controls: WASD to move, Space bar to jump, R to reload, E to do melee attack, F to throw items, B to buy, Shift or RMG to focus, H to dance, Enter to chat, Hold B to turn cards, LMB to shoot

vestaviahills.about: Vestavia Hills is a Hotline Miami and Call of Duty: Zombies inspired arcade top-down shooter. Featuring a tight and satisfying twist on Hotline Miami combat and an original 16-Bit OST, try to survive to the highest Wave you can.
vestaviahills.controls: Use the Mystery Box (bottom left of the map) to get Weapons, Use the Health Station (in the central room) to regain Health, Enter to Pause, WASD for Movement, Mouse for Aiming, Left Mouse Button to Attack, Right Mouse Button to Interact, R to Reload, G to Drop Current Weapon or Item, Number Row or Scroll Wheel to Swap Weapons/Items

vex5.about: Vex 5 is the fifth platform game in the Vex series. Each level is a labyrinth of deadly devices and traps. You have to outsmart these obstacles to reach the end. Expect some of the toughest challenges yet in this fifth installment.
vex5.controls: Use AD or left/right arrow to move. Use W or up arrow to jump. Use S or down arrow to crouch (enter an act)

vex6.about: Vex 6 is the sixth platform game in the Vex series. There are several new features and challenges in Vex 6. As usual, navigate through a series of tricky traps and obstacles to make it to the end of each level!
vex6.controls: Use AD or left/right arrow to move. Use W or up arrow to jump. Use S or down arrow to crouch (enter an act)

warbrokersio.about: War Brokers is an intense .io FPS game with various military vehicles and missions. You can customize your player's weapons and vehicles. In each game, you must complete the mission to bring your team to victory. Work together with your teammates and make use of the awesome tank, helicopter, and APC!
warbrokersio.controls: WASD or arrow keys to move or drive. Left-click to shoot. R to reload. Space bar to jump. M to access menu. Tab to open leaderboard

warfare1917.about: Lead the British or German army through the trenches of Europe in this First World War strategy game. Use infantry, armor and fire support to take control of the ground or bombard your foes into submission.2 Campaigns. British and German. Custom battle mode. Setup skirmishes the way you want!

warfare1944.about: Rising out of the trenches and onto the battlefield of Normandy, Warfare 1944 sees the U.S Forces take on the German Wehrmacht.
warfare1944.controls: Select unit then click on the battlefield to deploy.

whacktheboss.about: This game lets you get out all your inner frustration about your workplace by torturing your boss in different ways. Can you find all 7 ways of whacking him?
whacktheboss.controls: Left click to choose an object.

whackthecomputer.about: Find all 12 objects in the room to whack your computer!
whackthecomputer.controls: Click the objects to whack your computer!

whacktheex.about: Whack Your Ex lets you get out all your anger and frustration. Whack and insult your ex as much as you want. Use the items available at the bottom of the cartoon as weapons. In this game you can either whack the ex-boyfriend or the ex-girlfriend using a wide range of brutal methods.
whacktheex.controls: Use your mouse to play Whack Your Ex.

wordleunlimited.about: Wordle is a grid of five squares across and six squares down. Each horizontal row of five squares represents an opportunity to guess the random, five-letter word of the day.

worldbox.about: WorldBox is a free god and simulation Sandbox game. In this free Sandbox god game you can create life and watch it prosper! Spawn sheep, wolves, orks, elfs, dwarves and other magic creatures! Civilizations can craft and build houses, roads and go to war with each other. Help them survive, evolve and build powerful civilizations.

worldshardestgame.about: This is the self-proclaimed World's Hardest Game. Don't play it; it's too difficult! It really is! Wow this game has to be one of the most challenging but addictive games ever to be made! The aim is simple: all you have to do is guide your red block from one end of the level to the other and collect any yellow circles on the way. This might sound easy, but believe us when we say it isn't!
worldshardestgame.controls: Use the arrow keys or WASD

worldshardestgame2.about: World's Hardest Game 2 is the second episode of the self-proclaimed world's hardest game series! Hone your reflexes and accuracy as you try to move your little block to the end of each stage without touching the obstacles. Doing so will bring you back to the start so you can try again. The difficulty goes up after every stage, so keep your focus and see how far you can get in the World's Hardest Game 2.

yohoho.about: Yohoho is a multiplayer .io game developed by Exodragon Games. In this browser game, you play as a pirate and your objective is to rule the islands. The gameplay is based on eliminating other pirates, collecting gold, and growing in size.
yohoho.controls: To move, use your mouse or press WASD/arrow keys, To attack, press left mouse button or space bar. Hold to charge an attack

zombocalypse.about: Zombocalypse is a free zombie game. Its you vs. a horde of hungry, hungry zombies. Your goal: Make strategic use of limited ammo and health to stay alive (and unlock more powerful weapons). Tip: Call in an airstrike when things get too bitey.
zombocalypse.controls: left/right to move; spacebar to fire; down to pick up weapons and health; up to call airstrike

zombsroyale.about: Zombs Royale is a massive multiplayer Battle Royale game in your browser. Players are represented by circular figures on a 2D grid-like playing field, surrounded by a circular blue zone that shrinks as the game advances. Find weapons across the map in loot boxes such as crates and chests, houses and other buildings.
zombsroyale.controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, M or Tab to view map, E to interact, Left click to shoot, Right click to open emoticon list, R to reload
